law.catch_line: ADOPTION OF RULES OF PROCEDURE; MEETINGS OPEN TO PUBLIC.

structure.unit: ARTICLE II. - LEGISLATION, GOVERNING BODY, GENERAL POWERS

section.text: The City Council may from time to time establish rules for its proceedings as may be deemed necessary and proper. All legislative sessions of the City Council shall be open to the public, and the City Council shall not by executive session or otherwise vote on any question in private session. A full and accurate journal of the proceedings shall be kept and shall be open to the inspection of any qualified registered voter of the City.
